features: One 32 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion
Provides maximum moisture for severely dry skin
Made with a plant-based blend of botanical emollients like shea butter, avocado oil and jojoba seed oil
100% vegetarian formula made without harsh ingredients like parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Intensely moisturize and nourish skin with Alba Botanica Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion. Botanicals such as aloe vera, green tea and chamomile are combined with antioxidants and alpha hydroxy acids to relieve dry, irritated skin. Clinically proven to provide 24 hours of hydration, this rich lotion leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and supple. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens or phthalates. It is also not tested on animals.*

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion Intensely moisturize and nourish skin with Alba Botanica Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion. Botanicals such as aloe vera, green tea and chamomile are combined with antioxidants and alpha hydroxy acids to relieve dry, irritated skin. Clinically proven to provide 24 hours of hydration, this rich lotion leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and supple. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens or phthalates. It is also not tested on animals.*

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list Paraben Free Many of Alba Botanica products are packaged in bottles made from 100% post-consumer resin. Our unit cartons are made with FSC certified paperboard to ensure that the paper stock was sustainably sourced.

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated tomaking high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.
Alba Botanica Herbal Healing Body Lotion Alba Botanica Unscented Original Body Lotion Alba Botanica Coconut Rescue Body Lotion Alba Botanica Original Body Lotion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizer and not greasy
reviews.reviewText: I love this hand lotion. It’s just perfect and the smell is light and nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safely packaged, extremely moisturizing!
reviews.reviewText: I was very pleased with how this product arrived in its packaging. You could tell it was shipped with care. There was no way any accidental drop would puncture the bottle. The product itself is of great quality. My skin has a healthy sheen and feels really moisturized until my next wash when I use it, which is highly desired during these winter months. The product feels like its of good quality with no yucky mineral oil, which is not the best for you skin. My skin drinks this right up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must for every single day
reviews.reviewText: Please never stop making this lotion, because I use it every day to make my skin feel hydrated and normal. The scent is light and pleasant and I love that the ingredients are natural.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good moisturizer broken pump
reviews.reviewText: The lotion works fine. The pump is always broken. I have had to use the same pump from 5 or 6 bottles ago. Transferring it each time. What's up with that?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where has this been my whole life
reviews.reviewText: I really was struggling to find a good lotion that was natural with no strong scent to keep my insanely dry skin from getting painful and looking just.. bad. I've struggled with it my whole life. I only found one other lotion that has worked but the scent is very strong and some that don't have more of a refined sense of smell hate it (frankincense and myrrh, the company did not have the same lotion unscented sadly). My skin looks and feels SO much better, as well as my nails. I have been using this on my face as well with no issues. Your mileage may vary but I don't regret buying this one bit. It does have aha and I believe lactic acid, and while it does not say non-comedogenic on it, everything including someone touching me on the face gives me acne and this hasn't, likely due to that.Just be careful with sun exposure due to the added ingredients if not already aware and are not a label reader.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Lotion EVER!
reviews.reviewText: I've recently started trying to switch to more natural products but lotion hasn't been an option till now. From my experience natural body lotions are more liquid than solid and therefore hard to put on. This is not the case with the Alba Very Emollient. This lotion is thick and smells divine. I look forward to using it daily. I've never looked forward to using lotion. The consistency is thick and the smell is a mixture of floral and almond. It goes on easy and is not greasy at all. That's my complaint about many lotions. It's either easy on and doesn't work or it's too thick and greasy. This lotion is just right. I don't think I'll ever buy any other lotion. My skin is soft, no razor bumps, no dry elbows, no ashy skin, just soft and supple like lotion should be. This lotion also has AHA in it which is an anti aging skin smoothing product and so I tried this lotion on my face(I have dry skin) and it didn't break me out, or make me an oil slick. It was gentle enough for the face too!A surprising side effect. I don't know if this is normal but I use this after I shave. The hair is growing back slower and slower since I've started using it. It didn't say anything about this when I bought it. But no joke since I've been using this daily I only have to shave my legs once a week. Then it's barely stubble. I don't know if Alba meant for this product to do that but I love it. I've never loved a side effect before either lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super moisturizing, great dispenser.
reviews.reviewText: I usually buy one of these and it lasts me all winter. The big pump bottle is so easy to use, and I suppose it does leave a little product at the bottom, but it’s such a good value I’m not too concerned.It’s very moisturizing, with no detectable fragrance. I use it every morning right after a shower, and on my hands throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works great, has strong scent
reviews.reviewText: I love the way this product works on my skin, but I cannot stand the smell. It doesn't say unscented but it also doesn't say that there is a scent so beware if you are sensitive to scents like I am. Hard to describe the smell but it's kind of like roses. I've smelled this same (or similar) scent in the regular Olay face cream. I could not find an unscented version of this product so I will use it on my feet so it's covered up and I won't smell it.
I have dry, flaky skin and I have tried many lotions, this is the best. It absorbs into your skin almost instantly, with no greasy feeling. My 'go to' lotion from now on.

Una grata sorpresa encontrar esta crema libre de crueldad animal, vegana con ingredientes naturales, yo suelo tener la piel reseca y con poquita que me ponga la piel se ve diferente no necesitas días para ver resultados, se ven de inmediato.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: I've been using this for years, the best!
reviews.reviewText: It sinks in, rich but not greasy, really moisturizes rather than sitting on the skin. no heavy scents or perfumes. Just a very good product.
extremely good and value for money.

reviews.reviewTitle: The body covering lasts for many hours .
reviews.reviewText: Very effective, and relieves the itchiness of dry skin in the winter months.
